H0.text: According to the Bible, who was the only apostle to witness the crucifixion of Jesus. Peter

H1.text: According to the Bible, who was the only apostle to witness the crucifixion of Jesus. Andrew

H2.text: According to the Bible, who was the only apostle to witness the crucifixion of Jesus. Philip

H3.text: According to the Bible, who was the only apostle to witness the crucifixion of Jesus. John

A4.text: The 'beloved disciple' alone, among the Apostles, remained near Jesus at the foot of the cross on Calvary alongside myrrhbearers and numerous other women.

A5.text: Mark, Matthew and Luke do not mention any one of the twelve disciples having witnessed the crucifixion.
